attributes.action: limit the number of houses a private individual can own and rent to the public through taxation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Bringing in an additional taxation on the income generated by a single private individual or ltd company renting out more than 30 houses would help reduce property prices, making accommodation cheaper for those on lower incomes and first time buyers. 
A suggestion rate for this taxation could about be:-
>  30     -  additional 15% in taxation.
>  60       - additional 20% in taxation.
>  90     -  additional 25% in taxation.
>  120       - additional 30% in taxation.
